commands.name: az vmware datastore elastic-san-volume create
commands.summary: Create an Elastic SAN volume in a private cloud cluster using Microsoft.ElasticSan provider.
commands.syntax:
az vmware datastore elastic-san-volume create --cluster
                                              --datastore-name
                                              --elastic-san-volume
                                              --private-cloud
                                              --resource-group
                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
